title: Ryland Bangerter’s CV
text:
Computer Scientist, BYUI Student, Data Science

ban24039@byui.edu | My LinkedIn page



Working on getting my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science


Computer science, tennis, web development, data analysis



Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), Machine Learning & Applied AI, Web Development, Data Visualization & Analysis




2020-2024
Ridgevue High School
August 2024 - December 2024
College of Western Idaho
January 2025 - Present
Brigham Young University Idaho



2024-2025
Remarkable Futures Scholarship from Chick-fil-A for academic and leadership excellence
May 2024
Ranked in the Top 10 in Statewide Tennis as a state-qualified athlete.




2024
Softball Player Swing Scorer
- Developed a full-stack application to process and display user softball statistics in an easy-to-read table format.
- Conducted team meetings and utilized SQL and .NET tools for project success.
- Strengthened teamwork and software development skills in a remote working environment.
2024
Senior High School Project: Food Canning
- Gained practical knowledge in food canning and researched its history.
- Delivered an engaging presentation to a panel of judges, showcasing the benefits and importance of canning.



June 2022 – Present
Team Lead- Chick-fil-A | Nampa, ID
- Trained 10+ team members in customer service, operational processes, and food preparation standards.
- Directed a team of 10 in nightly cleaning and operational tasks, ensuring adherence to quality standards.
- Coordinated with supervisors to streamline workflows and achieve shift objectives.
January 2025 - April 2025
Early Morning Custodian- Brigham Young University Idaho | Rexburg, ID
- Cleaned and maintained offices, hallways, and restrooms to ensure a sanitary and organized environment.
- Followed a structured cleaning routine to complete tasks efficiently before the start of the school day.
- Developed strong time management skills by balancing work responsibilities with other commitments.
August 2023 - May 2024
Social Media Manager- Ridgevue High School | Nampa, ID
- Managed and maintained Instagram and X accounts, ensuring consistent branding and audience engagement.
- Designed eye-catching graphics and promotional materials using Canva to enhance social media presence.
- Developed and scheduled posts, interacted with followers, and implemented strategies to increase reach and engagement.
October 2021 – January 2022
Assembly Line Worker- Franklin Sensors | Meridian, ID
- Assembled and inspected 100+ stud finders daily, maintaining a 98% accuracy rate.
- Conducted quality control checks on finished products to ensure conformance with specifications.
- Improved production efficiency by identifying and addressing workflow bottlenecks.
